2020000.name: Project Crack Platoon
2020000.description: Dive into the world of high-stakes espionage with our hardcore stealth-based tactical shooter, where you and your team step into the shoes of Tier 1 operators. Engage in intense, strategy-driven gameplay where every decision counts. Navigate treacherous environments, outsmart advanced AI opponents, and use cutting-edge gadgets to complete your missions. Engage in strategic Co-Op multiplayer and immersive PvP modes, where teamwork and precision are crucial. Whether infiltrating enemy bases or coordinating with teammates, precision and patience are key. Join our global community of elite operatives and test your skills in adrenaline-fueled challenges. Are you ready to embrace the shadows?
2020000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
